name: Flow Line - Love Color Ballzs
description:
Flow line is a very simple and creative and addictive puzzle game, easy to play and fun game, from now on, let us enjoy a simple and addictive puzzle game!

Connect the matching color to the pipe to create a line. Pair all colors and cover the entire board to solve each puzzle. But please note that if the pipes intersect or overlap, the previous pipes will disappear! The points between the same color are connected to each other until the entire space is filled, and it is considered to pass!

Play dozens of levels for free, or race against time in time trial mode. The gameplay mode has three modes: simple/medium/hard, to challenge and fanaticism, and somewhere in between. How you play depends on you. So, try Flow Line and experience a different experience!
